title: Procurement Irregularities in Project X
summary: Officials under scrutiny for inflated contract values in a high-value defence procurement deal.

title: Municipal Land Scam in Eastern Zone
summary: Dozens of acres of public land were allegedly sold to private developers at undervalued prices.

title: Healthcare Procurement Misuse
summary: Audit teams uncover irregularities in the supply of medical equipment during emergency procurement.

title: Mining Royalties Evasion Case
summary: The court concludes a 3-year-long case on royalty evasion by multiple mining companies.
